page.title: 08LEONS MOTOR SERVICES LTD.(1)
page.content: Leons motor services is a family business{started}in{1923.}It is a limited company with 7 shareholders. Altogether it employs 34 people 22 drivers,6 mechanics,2 cleaners and 4 office staff.The firm has its own garage which holds 11 coaches,11 double decker buses and 2 continental coaches.These all run on diesel and will give a performance of between 9 and 14 miles to the gallon.This motor firm takes on a variety of work made up of 30%{coach trips,}20% school {contracts}and 50%{public transport which covers an area from Doncaster, South through to Finningley the most recent addition to the transport is the run from Doncaster to Bawtry.The schools contract service entails taking children to and from school twice sometimes three times a day.
